-- Noir --

Noir smiles faintly as she listens to Gatara's small words of 
comfort. That was probably the most impressive display of emotion 
that a bot could get out of the cold transformer. Words, however, 
didn't really affect her, and the consolation had fallen on deaf 
ears. Noir was either refusing to open up, or she was just incapable 
of talking for some reason or another. Too many things of the past 
still affected her, things which she couldn't get rid of. 
Thankfully, she was able to focus and fight efficiently, and the 
memories only affected her when her mind wasn't occupied on 
something. Perhaps that was why she'd taken on repairs and other 
technical abillites as a hobby of sorts.

Noir lightly shrugs off Gatara's large hand, "Alright Gatara, I will 
stay here. I'm fully prepared to start doing missions for Devilcat 
again." She said as she went over to the sensors, axious to have 
something to attack, or a job to do.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Gatara::
> 
> "Negatory," Gatara dismisses the notion with a wave of her hand.  
> "They'll be back soon.  I expect Jayde will need some time in the 
CR 
> - she never learns."
> 
> The brownish-green bot places a hand on Noir's shoulder.  "Don't 
let 
> it get to you.  Everyone messes up once in a while, and we've had 
> setbacks before.  We'll recover, just like we always do."
>
